post_author: DJ Loose Change We Can Believe In
post_subtitle: Boy, this week, have we got a special treat! We bring you: a year-end review of Barack Obama's year-end reviews!
As we're sure you're all aware, the year is winding to a close. And, as such, we decided it would be a good idea to get our affairs in order.
Well, friends and faithful readers, it's all coming to an end.

post_title: Rage Against The Machine Gun Kelly
post_subtitle: We apologize for the delay in bringing you the WMT this week. Yes, we still made it in on a Monday, but it's a little bit later than usual, isn't it? Well, as it turns out, it'll have to do, because we had to see a man about a machine gun.
And now, for the latest installment in The Adventures of Johnny Drumsticks!
Now, about those calls for unity...
